alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 4:42PM EST until January 11 at 9:35AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. For the Red River...including Clay City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue to a crest of 18.8 feet by Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage by early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
